item.title: Pills been left outside in a communal area where children live and play. They are opened and across the grass, 19th January
item.description:
Pills have been left on the slope coming up to the house. They are open and in a container and across the grass easy for children or anybody to pick up. It’s dangerous for the children that live up here. We have many vulnerable people (adults and children) who live in the houses around this area. Someone needs to come collect ASAP before anything happens like a child picking one up and putting it in their mouth. This is from a women who the council has housed up here. She’s always got groups of people in her house and in the area that all do drugs. We have had multiple used needles up here which we move straight away due to the children up here. Please can someone come remove these pills

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ravensbourne Avenue, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Previously repaired road (twice) by the gas board, 19th January
item.description:
I have previously reported this and met one of your engineers who marked all areas of concern both road and pavement.Unfortunately i have lost all previous emails and case numbers.I reported this a few months ago and to date nothing has been done.I am concerned that there is quite a few elderly people who live in the close and walk to the high street daily.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ash Close, Albany Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This guy parks on double yellow lines outside a primary school when kids get out, 19th January
item.description:

item.title: Desiced cat found, 19th January
item.description:
My daughter had her decised cat removed from Southend rd beckenham last week she had no idea where it is and desperate to get him home he is white and grey and was given a ref number 8681256 please help her get him home or email me with any information thankyou
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southend Road, New Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
